name: Snake Game (pgruessing)
description:
Thank you for taking a look at my Snake Game. It is based on a Udemy course I took for Game Maker Studio2. I just wanted to practice setting up an itch.io account and uploading a project. I know it is not much but it is my first finished game so I figured why not let's go ahead and put it up there! 

Comments are appreciated and donations are as well. I am currently working on my first platformer and should have that out soon on here for all of you to try! Questions? Concerns? Email me @ pgruessing@sensationinteractive.com

Thank you!

Peter

Check out our blog https://www.sensationinteractive.com
